website_summaries.verdict: An undiluted blend of two strains of lavender that helps to relieve muscular pain while easing away stress and tension. Generous quantity goes a long way and offers great value for money.
pros: Lavender acts as a gentle yet effective anti-inflammatory and analgesic when topically applied
Wonderful, calming aroma reduces muscle stiffness caused by tension and anxiety and promotes better sleep
Blend consists of two types of lavender, extracted via steam distillation for the highest levels of purity
Consistent quality at an affordable price
cons: Some feel that the aroma dissipates a little too quickly when used in a diffuser

customer_reviews.title: PROVEN FAKE OIL.  COMPANY BEING SUED.
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could give this negative stars. It’s been proven to be a completely FAKE oil; no lavender whatsoever; 100% synthetic. Complaint is now in a class action lawauit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Class action lawsuit too many chemicals. Not pure
customer_reviews.text: I liked it however I see a class action lawsuit for chemicals in the oils . I won’t be buying it anymore and I bought several.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl loconte

customer_reviews.title: the first one was great smell was great and I used in my diffuser ...
customer_reviews.text: So this was the 2nd bottle of this that I purchased, the first one was great smell was great and I used in my diffuser in my bedroom at night. I figured how could I go wrong so I ordered this a 2nd time this new bottle is definitely not lavender oil not sure what it is but it smells awful and I cannot even return it very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Hart

customer_reviews.title: Not 100%
customer_reviews.text: Smells horribly like chemicals. I've used higher end essential oils and I love lavender so I got the big bottle. This stuff smells so different and barely like real lavender. I've also just recently seen an analysis on the chemical makeup of this brands lavender. FAKE PRODUCT. This is not 100% lavender oil.
customer_reviews.author: RosiesMoM

customer_reviews.title: Oil melts its own packaging and leaks
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what the oil base is, but it's not compatible with the rubber bulb on the provided dropper. It dissolved the rubber and ruined my night stand. Don't use in anything plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nope!
customer_reviews.text: I'm sorry, but I've been dealing with essential oils, lavender in particular, for a long time, and this does not do it for me. I thought I would try this out based on the reviews, but it was a huge mistake. It has a very non-lavender smell. Hard to explain but it smells more like chemicals then lavender. Doesn't even remotely resemble the smell of lavender. The people who gave this a high rating apparently never used DoTERRA. Maybe this is a bad batch? In any case, this was the most awful smelling stuff I've ever smelled in my life. Threw the whole bottle away. What a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Magic

customer_reviews.title: this does not have a nice lavender smell
customer_reviews.text: for some reason, this does not have a nice lavender smell. It may be rancid, or mixed with an unpleasant smelling oil. I don't know. I order Ylang Ylang from this same company and that is quite nice.
customer_reviews.author: Photodestiny395

customer_reviews.title: ... 2 days now and my sleep has never been better. I use this in an oil diffuser and ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for 2 days now and my sleep has never been better. I use this in an oil diffuser and just a couple of drops are enough to produce a strong enough smell. The bottle is quite large and given the amount required for a full night of diffusing, it's gonna last a while. Highly recommend it anyone!
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Didn't smell of lavender. Threw away. Product has changed from previous orders.
customer_reviews.text: Have bought this product before and was pleased in soap making. This time it didn't smell of lavender. Threw the soap and product away. Something has changed. Disappointed. Will not order again
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy! Majestic Pure has A No Return Policy hmmm wonder why
customer_reviews.text: Very sad that a company can be so misleading, this is not real EO! Does not even smell like lavender, smells like water scented with some kind of lavenderish chemical. Look up testing that was done on this, Bad, Bad stuff! Do your research on EO before you buy any, I've learned my lesson.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: Delicious in essential oil blends for perfumes, bath products including bath teas, soaps, face washes and also for aromatherapy
customer_reviews.author: Annette Pitre

customer_reviews.title: The bottles lids do not fit the bottles
customer_reviews.text: what I liked: I was sent essential oil. What I disliked: The bottle does not fit the provided lids. You cannot, I repeat CANNOT seal the bottle. I bought two different oils and one lid was too big for the bottle, the other too small So unless you want open bottles of oils, id go with a different seller (why this is important: lavender oil is corrosive, so after spilling it onto my hardwood floor, it ate through the top layer of varnish)
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Davis

customer_reviews.title: Just horrible
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed in this purchase. It does not remotely smell like lavender. It's a very machine-like and chemical scent. I can't imagine anyone liking this. Fortunately I was able to return for a refund. The lavender that I rec'd with my Woolzies laundry balls was oodles better and will likely go back to that even though it's pricier.
customer_reviews.author: pruthie

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't smell much like Lavender.
customer_reviews.text: This smells more like cheap perfume, so I'm guessing there is more of the Lavandula hybrida, the French type oil rather than the Lavandula latifolia, which is what I see in most brands. I thought this was very inexpensive for the amount of oil, but you get what you pay for. I'm using it as part of my homemade Lemongrass bug repellent.
customer_reviews.author: C. M. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great product. This is my 4th order
customer_reviews.text: Great product. This is my 4th order. I drop some on my pillow and have a good night sleep. It really helps my imsonia and night eating. I wake up refreshed in the morning. Beside no stains left on the pillow, because it is pure.
customer_reviews.author: ayse

customer_reviews.title: Smells wonderful. Great for soaps and lotions.
customer_reviews.text: I got this oil to add to homemade soaps and lotions. It smells wonderful and is easy to use with the included dropper. The bottle is large and will likely last a long time. I can't attest to how therapeutic it is but I do enjoy the smell. Since Lavender can have a calming effect, I like to add some to my shampoo as well. Overall, this is a nice bottle of Lavender Oil. I did receive a discount in order to test the product. However, I post reviews so consumers can make informed decisions. Thus, any discounts received have no impact on my reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Youaremysunshine

customer_reviews.title: 100% FAKE, DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Wow, wish I had researched this product before buying. It smelled a little off from the beginning but I trusted it thinking it was just in my head since it's labeled as sold as 100% pure and natural therapeutic grade. It doesn't smell like ACTUAL lavender though!!!! I did a little digging and come to find out there was a class action lawsuit against them for selling synthetic, carcinogenic "oils".....so sad and disgusted I wasted my money on this. If you want a fake lavender-y overpriced oil then go for this, but I'd suggest putting your hard earned money elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: howard

customer_reviews.title: Stinks and is making me nauseous! !!
customer_reviews.text: I finally opened and used this a few hours ago without checking the smell or quality. Put it quickly on my face to ward off gnats. Not sure what this stuff is but it's not lavender. It has a horrible overwhelming smell that smells nothing like lavender. Also, the dropper was sliced when I received it. Not sure what that's about. Yuck!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Divine
customer_reviews.text: I have a problem in my kitchen because the door to my garage is in my kitchen and my husband constantly goes through that door to access the side of the house. Letting in flies. I read on the bottle that this product repels flies so I put some in a pot of water and put it on med. Let me tell you that this works!!!!!!. Not only does it repel the flies but it has the whole house smelling good.
customer_reviews.author: B. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Fragrance is fairly good
customer_reviews.text: Like the fact it comes with separate dropper. The fragrance is mild, I had to use several droppers full in a 300ml diffuser in order to smell the lavender, I prefer stronger lavender scent. I use it in diffusers. I've purchased this brand a few times, now I'm looking for an essential oil that has stronger scent, after all 4 oz in less than a a month it becomes expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Marty N.

customer_reviews.title: Odd smell
customer_reviews.text: I returned this product. I had another brand lavender at home and this one smelled medicinal and stale when I compared it to the other bottle. I just didn't like it at all. Since the other brand is no longer available, I am now hunting for another large bottle of lavender oil that is pure. The search continues, because this one didn't do it.
customer_reviews.author: JTMYOB21

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Doesn't smell like other lavender oils I have had, I don't particularly like how this one smells. Also did NOT come with the dropper pictured so it spills everywhere when I try to use it... want to return.
customer_reviews.author: Bec

customer_reviews.title: Not Essential oils!
customer_reviews.text: These are not essential oils. Majestic Pure is purely a lie. This smells nothing like lavender and the peppermint I bought was awful too. They have an off-putting scent. I don't know what it is but it is not pleasant. I'm returning them!
customer_reviews.author: educator2612

customer_reviews.title: Not Real!  Other chemicals are used!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this brand without doing much research. Majestic pure organic essential oils Are not 100% pure! They are filled with other chemicals and not good for pets and humans to consume. Yes, the quantitee is large but, let's keep it real! Oils are not supposed to be that large in quantity for pennies on the dollar. This for me is a red flag. I am sad that I purchase so many bottles. I will find some creative way to use them with out poisoning my home!
customer_reviews.author: Totally Honest

customer_reviews.title: Great Oil!
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil! Such a reasonable price for the quality! The dropper doesn't fill all the way up the stem, not even half way. It's okay though because that is just a minor inconvenience. I will definitely be buying again once I run out. It works great in all of my diffusers and makes the room smell great! I would recommend to anyone. I use it in the restroom, which also takes care of the litter box smell.
customer_reviews.author: Zane

customer_reviews.title: Oh so relaxing
customer_reviews.text: I am someone who deals with consistent stress and anxiety and Ive been in the market for a natural reliever. My good friend recommended me to try lavender oils to soothe and calm my nerves and let me tell you this stuff actually hits! After just one use I felt it not just give me a sense of calm but it also soothed my headaches! I am obsessed! I sprinkle a bit on my pillow just before bed and even dab just a tiny bit near my neck. It has been gentle and non-irritating. An extra plus is that the lavender oils leaves a pleasant scent in my bedroom for a couple days even when I haven't used it!
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: High quality!
customer_reviews.text: Use this in my aromatherapy diffuser to relax and it's absolutely one of the best purchases I have made to date.
customer_reviews.author: Mandi

customer_reviews.title: Review changed :(
customer_reviews.text: We have bought this many times and loved it. The last 2 that we have gotten though have a bitter smell to it that isn't pleasing or soothing and does not smell like lavender. We use is for our special needs grandson who is deaf and blind and has a specific routine and certain smells to help him know what's going on. This lavender is the smell he has learned means it's bedtime. I hoped it was just a bad one when the first smelly one came but when the second one got here and smelt just as bad I was disappointed. We are now needing to look into finding a new brand.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Really bad smell
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of Majestic oils but this Lavender smells Really bad compared with the other brands I purchased. I was disappointed since my other purchases with this company have turned out awesome not sure what happened here . Going to reach out to customer servive on this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: cris m

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Smell Good, NOT AT ALL!
customer_reviews.text: We use a few drops of lavender oil on wool balls at the end of our dryer cycle. Previously used Calily lavender oil, and loved it. That brand was not available in the large bottle when I went to replace it, so bought this brand instead. I regret it because now I have to go and buy another bottle of some other brand. It smells like p o o p.
customer_reviews.author: Bad BAd Cook

customer_reviews.title: Majestic Pure Lavender Oil
customer_reviews.text: I have bought lavender oil for a long time. My daughter had a diffuser in her room that gets turned on at night so she sleeps well! This is a very good price for a big bottle! I have used it the past two nights and it smells amazing! I will definitely be looking at buying different oils in this brand!
customer_reviews.author: Razorback Fan

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Came in a nice little white box of it own & then an Amazon outer box to make sure it would t break. Smells lovely. Love this money saving two pack. One for me & the other for a stocking stuffer gift. I use lavender in my essential oil dispenser all day long. Such a homey & relaxing scent. Then I refill it for overnight. Provides a sense of well being. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: McSusie

customer_reviews.title: Not good, burned my face
customer_reviews.text: Burned my skin when no other lavender oil would, left my face visibly damaged, and it never helped with any of my acne problems. I did the spot test on my elbow, it was ok. Not even sure if this oil is real lavender oil since none of the others I've tried have caused any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Damon

customer_reviews.title: Clean, Fresh and Pure !!!
customer_reviews.text: This Lemon is Clean, Fresh and Pure. I use non-electric, bamboo wicking for my non-diluted Lemon and Lavender aromatherapy (they sell the bamboo wicking sticks at Pier-1). This lemon scent lasts an incredibly long time. The Fresh Lemon scent greets you as you enter the room and makes you smile. I also rub it on my furniture. I will be buying again soon from Majestic Pure. They use California Lemons too!
customer_reviews.author: M. Youngblood

customer_reviews.title: SAD DELIVERY
customer_reviews.text: We haven't tried the product yet, but we're confident it will be what expect...thus the 5-Star reviews. But the "DING-BAT" young delivery driver decided to leave the package where it was difficult for me to retrieve from my wheelchair, regardless of easy-to-see request...see photo. The white chain blocks the stairs and the sign attached asks people to use ramp (to the right of stairs). Further, stairs are blocked by our Golden Retriever statue. Oh well...no big deal. Just had to "vent". Thanks... Ray
customer_reviews.author: FlyGuyRay

customer_reviews.title: Best Lavender scent ever
customer_reviews.text: I actually purchased this lavender oil as a disinfectant to add to my carpet fresh I make and to my cleaning steam mop. I have a cat and a messy person living with me so the smells of the house can be harsh. This lavender oil is the best I have run across and WOW does it do the job. After I clean the house with the Lavender oil, no smell's just good clean lavender smells. I will purchase this again and from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Great oil, perfect packaging and glass dropper included!
customer_reviews.text: The sent is great it's not overpowering at all but strong enough to make an impact. My children love this lavender oil and put a drop on their wrists at bedtime to help them fall asleep. I have to say that the glass bottle and glasses dropper are of high quality as well. You cannot beat the price and get a better oil. I'm very happy with my product aan am looking forward to more oils from Majestic Pure*
customer_reviews.author: Brittney P.

customer_reviews.title: NO SCENT
customer_reviews.text: There is no scent of lavender whatsoever. I use lavender oil on woolen dryer balls and clothes come out smelling amazing. Tried this one and applied a generous amount and there’s no scent when clothes come out of the dryer. The dispensing bottle is very good but the product inside not so much. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Tejvir Vaghela

customer_reviews.title: Such a wonderful aromatic smell. So fresh
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic smell. I live on the shores of lake erie. And tonight it is a clear sky moonlit night with powerful winds. I put a few drops on a piece of cotton and cracked my window open..as I lay here with fresh air coming in my bedroom . combined with this wonderful aromatic lavender smell listening to nature sounds as I drift off ever so gently into the night..I will definitely be ordering multiple scents from this wonderful company..good night and peace on earth.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SUPER Relaxation Power!
customer_reviews.text: I am really impressed. This is excellent, high-quality lavender. The scent is robust, and it's clearly potent. I had become accustomed to using another bottle (from a different brand) without diluting it at all. When I got a bug bite and decided to test this, I did the same: applied 1 drop directly to the bite. There was no burning or irritation. There was a fast reduction in the swelling and itching - but I also had to take a nap! I had forgotten how sedative lavender can be: a good reminder. It was a good nap, too ;-) Anyway, it's a great bottle of lavender, just remember: a little goes a LONG way!
customer_reviews.author: Ninacarme N Monroe

customer_reviews.title: It did not smell like Lavender
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these bottles a while ago, and I loved them because the scent was strong. I use lavender frequently for many things, especially for humidifiers. I was running out of my one bottle, so I decided to order the dual pack. When I opened the container, the smell was very rough and not at all what I was expecting. It did not smell anything like the first bottle I purchased. I went ahead and opened the second bottle that came in the pack of two, and I had the same result. A harsh smell that was nothing like Lavender was present. I hope this didn't happen to everyone purchasing this product.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Large Bottle of Lavender with Glass Dropper Top Included
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with this lavender; it's a little different that others I've used because it is two types of lavender oil mixed. I use it mixed with coconut oil, vodka, citronella (just a tiny bit because I'm not fond of the smell), and lemon for a natural, mosquito repellant mix. I also add a few drops to my laundry soap dispenser to make our clothes smell extra fresh. This is a very large bottle that should last me a long time. I recommend it to those looking for a high quality Lavender essential oil.
customer_reviews.author: Laura B.

customer_reviews.title: Dont fall for tge high rating!
customer_reviews.text: I dont understand how can this oil get such high rating. The product is irritating to my skin, and im never a sensitive skin type of person. And it smell nothing like any lavender essential oil i ever purchares ("better" band at higher price). Then i read the negative reviews and tge "failed" testing result from third party lab. I regret getting tgis product and i will rerurn it togetger witg 3 other unopen essential oil i got of tge smae brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: It has an overwhelming chemical smell. I used it once and then never again. Don't waste your money, get something different
customer_reviews.author: Karen Phelps

customer_reviews.title: Teacher Use:
customer_reviews.text: As a teacher I needed a bottle that would last awhile, and oil strong enough to fill a room when a bunch of stinky teenagers come and go. I usually have a diffuser going on all day- for about 8-10 hours. And a couple drops of lavender really last, and add a calming air to my classroom! I have a minor case of sensory overload- so when artificial essential oils are packed with weird byproduct or chemicals - it gives me a migraine and nausea - luckily this oil is just fine on the senses!
customer_reviews.author: Marin

customer_reviews.title: It does not smell like it is pure
customer_reviews.text: This is terrible- DO NOT BUY! It does not smell like it is pure. There is definitely something off about this oil. I refuse to use it on my baby, which is the purpose of my purchase. I was looking for a less expensive alternative from Young Living- this is NOT it! I tried Eden's Garden and that brand seems much more like the quality one would expect from Young Living. I wish I listened to all of the other bad reviews.
customer_reviews.author: LW963

customer_reviews.title: yikes
customer_reviews.text: i've had a few different brands of lavender oil. i thought i would try this one because it was on special for a limited time..i got it yesterday and am returning today...it has a very strong medicine smell attached to it..i use it on my wool dryer balls and don't need my clothes/linens to smell like medicine..thanks but no thanks....
customer_reviews.author: kemdee

customer_reviews.title: Poor, poor and did I mention Poor?
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased several bottles of this lavender and on the last bottle the scent is not lavender. It must of mixed with something else at their facility. I reached out to the manufacturer and got no response. This company does not stand behind their product.
customer_reviews.author: Yurplace

customer_reviews.title: Love the scent of this Lavender...
customer_reviews.text: Love the scent of this and arrived packaged well so no issues. Would def. order again!
customer_reviews.author: Christel R.

customer_reviews.title: Putrid
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased Majestic Pure lavender oil before, I liked it and purchased 2 4 oz bottles. Well to my dismay it is putrid, there is no lavender smell whatsoever, sort of smells like dirty feet. I am so disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy D. Baddick

customer_reviews.title: Works great on insect bites
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as an anti-itch for insect bites. It relieves itch and pain of bites in just a few minutes. However, I bought this in 2016 on Amazon, same product, same manufacturer, same size and the price today has more than doubled - from $10.50 to $22.00. Lavendar oil is available from many other suppliers for a reasonable price. I will no longer purchase from Majestic Pure.
customer_reviews.author: Lakegirl

customer_reviews.title: Best way to fight allergies and relax at night!!
customer_reviews.text: I love Majestic pure essential oils. Lavender is perfect for evenings and relaxing so we have it in all of our diffusers at night. Allergies are pretty bad right now in these parts so I mix it with a little eucalyptus and it helps us breathe easily and helps the kids as well. It's a much better approach than taking antihistamines and the like, at least that's my take on it right now.
customer_reviews.author: texaschristina

customer_reviews.title: Lavender oil smells like WD-40
customer_reviews.text: When I put a few drops in my diffuser and waited for the lavender to circulate, both my husband and myself both commented that the aroma smelled like WD-40. I have been studying aromatherapy since 2004 and definitely know how lavender should smell like. Previously, I had ordered another product (same size and price), and I loved it. I decided to give this brand a try and if you want your home to smell like WD-40, then this is the place. L.O
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Lavender or Chemical-Lavender..
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was great arrive in perfect condition, oil doesn't smell like Lavender. it smells like chemicals infused Lavender, I though was getting a great deal 4oz for about 13 bucks amazing, Wrong... I would take items with over 1k 5 star reviews with grain of sand, I feel the reviews maybe paid or bogus. I would assume you get what you pay for. never again. Plus seller was not responsive or any explanation to the bad product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazing-Amazon

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy it again
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the smell of this product quite as much as the pure lavender oils (which are much more expensive) but the fragrance does seem to have more staying power than the purer very expensive oils. We use it in a diffuser overnight in the bedroom, and I can still smell it hours after the diffuser timer stops. The smell of this product is closer to French lavender than to English lavender. At this price it is hard to go wrong for use in a diffuser or added to a cleaning product as several reviewers have mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: WestieloverTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Very strong scent not very to have
customer_reviews.text: It smells too strong a little too much for everyone to handle in my house I don't think I will be buying this again it was worth a try to have it see what I could do I'm glad it feels like my whole room just with two drops on my bed and my carpet for good smell but still it's just too strong that is my only problem and for that I will not buy this brand directly
customer_reviews.author: makayla samuels

customer_reviews.title: Bad smells
customer_reviews.text: Lavender smells overwhelmingly like chemicals. Avoid this and seek out an independently tested EO company to ensure you get a real EO and not a chemically manufactured mixture that barely resembles the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: First bottle was amazing! Second smelled like garlic.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what to rate this at... I ordered a bottle last year, it was INCREDIBLE! I used it for aromatherapy, cleaning, in lotions. It smelled divine and lasted forever. When I ran out I ordered a second bottle, a NO BRAINER. I started using it an noticed the smell was less lavender, more herby?? It bugged me and I started to realize it smelled like garlic. Now I'm finding it almost impossible to use. I understand that there's the potential for variations between bottles/batches, but this second one doesn't smell like lavender at all. I definitely want to reorder, but I'm apprehensive about getting another off-bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Horrible smell... Can't return
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I have used this brand. The first bottle was wonderful. This bottle smells horrible. It is not useable. Unfortunately I opened it when I finished the bottle I was using after the return deadline. Now I am out money and I am very dissatisfied. I will never use this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa L. Edie

customer_reviews.title: Great Lavender Oil ZZZzzz
customer_reviews.text: Great scent, and a great level of quality. Some essential oils really just smell like alcohol extracts but not this one. They must have a very efficient extraction method as this is a much larger amount than local stores offer for the price. Purchased a few times and the product has stayed consistent.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: A Calming Scent for the family and dogs
customer_reviews.text: I love this scent. I am constantly purchasing this and if I run out I go into a panic. It keeps the kids and dog calm. I mixed a little with water and put a little on my dog collar so she will remain calm in our walks. I use it all over the home in a diffuser. It is great as a gift because it is difficult not to love this scent.
customer_reviews.author: P. A

customer_reviews.title: Lavender smells relaxing
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time buying this, I bought the first one a year and half ago and I use it just about every night in my diffuser, it really helps with relaxing to sleep. I also use it once a year to make candles so this 4oz bottle goes a long way! I recommend it. I've only tried the lavender in this brand but I do plan on buying peppermint, jazmine and eucalyptus!
customer_reviews.author: AmandaY

customer_reviews.title: Not consistent
customer_reviews.text: I loved the lavender oil the first time I ordered it, then reordered it. Exact same bottle came in the mail, but it smelt vile. I thought I got a bad bottle so I ordered another. Just a vile! I’m so disappointed, I loved it the first time
customer_reviews.author: Ann Farrell

customer_reviews.title: most recent purchase has different, weird smell
customer_reviews.text: This is probably.my mostrecurring purchase on Amazon; I use the lavender for aromatherapy and perfume. I've been buying this exact bottle for three years so I'm in love. but my most recent purchase definitely doesn't smell like lavender, or at least the one I'm used to. it it even tingles more when it contacted the skin, almost a stinging sensation but not quite. so I am disappointed in this purchase. I'll update on whether or not I purchase another and if the quality is the same as this one
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love the size of the bottle i go through lavender alot because of the way it helps with my migraines!!!(hence the reason i gave it 5 stars for pain relief) this lavender smells amazing!!! I use it in my oil diffuser and my oil diffuser necklace now it lasts for days in my necklace over all very satisfied with this product and would def recomend!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Simpson

customer_reviews.title: LOVE! Great healing oil.
customer_reviews.text: Great for cuts, great to help sleep and 1,000 other things!
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie St James

customer_reviews.title: Nice smoothing smell, great value!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, smoothing smell of Lavender. I put a few drops in my diffuser and it has totally changed the mood in my room. If you need help relaxing at night, then this is the product for you! I do recommend ordering this large size because you will want to use it every evening and you'll save money in the long run too. I've seen 1oz of Lavender sell for as much as $9, so this is definitely a good deal. It comes with a dropper which I really like so I don't accidentally add too much. Great value, nice smell, order with confidence! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Virginia R.

customer_reviews.title: The smells are absolutely wonderful!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really love everything about them. They smell so very good and the scent stays for a very long time!!!! I love everything that I have ordered from Amazon Prime. They are delivered on time and I just love everything about everything that I have purchased!!!! I have given some diffusers and oils as gifts and everyone seems to love them very much!!!! Thank you so much!!!! Cathy Irwin
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Irwin

customer_reviews.title: I've been spoiled with good lavender oil from a local lavender farm and foolishly ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been spoiled with good lavender oil from a local lavender farm and foolishly thought I could cut corners and save money by ordering this much less expensive product. This is not pure lavender oil. It smells like cleaning product with a hint of lavender. If you want a quality product, don't be cheap. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Purchasesd in an attempt to wean myself off of the crazy expensive brands. Looks like I've learned my lesson.
customer_reviews.text: In an attempt to wean myself off of the really expensive brands I purchased this one. My overall opinion on Majestic Pure's Lavender oil is this: I don't like is that a baby powder or baby oil scent to it. It definitely doesn't smell like pure lavender oil. And, I was really disappointed to read in the questions/answers (listed here on Amazon) that this oil IS NOT actually lavender oil. I didn't do my homework. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: L. McKeat

customer_reviews.title: I bought again and would likely buy again
customer_reviews.text: I liked it better when it was a couple of dollars cheaper, but I bought again and would likely buy again if it doesn't keep going up in price.
customer_reviews.author: Mason L Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Not a quality product
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely NOT lavender essential oil, at least not like I've ever smelled before. And looking at the questions and reviews others feel this way too. I will not purchase this product again, it's worth it to me to spend a little more on a better quality product. Some reviews say this product is totally artificial based on 3rd party testing.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t wasted your money and time. It is not good! At all!
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying lavender essential oil for a while. I bought this one because I ran out of my old one. But this essential oil is very poor quality. It doesn’t smell like lavender at all. I don’t recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Erickar33

customer_reviews.title: Smells Essential Crap
customer_reviews.text: This can't be Lavender, it smells horrible, so badly that I refuse to use it. Too much energy to ship back, just do not order. I ordered a few other oils from this brand and they are all weak. NOW Essential Oils have a much stronger scent. I'm so tired of the scams. You can pour a whole bottle into the diffuser and it stills smells like everything but what it's suppose to smell like.
customer_reviews.author: Lyvonne

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it's No. 1 ranking
customer_reviews.text: I am a price sensitive shopper (except for brands I totally adore, then I become irrational). So before I purchased another lavender bottle, I googled best lavender brands for 2016, and Majestic Pure was No. 1. I am very happy with this brand (except for the lemon oil). It smells like I am lost in a lavender garden, and each exit leads to more lavender. I read the review from the customer that compared it to another brand by oil blotting and I'm really curious about that. I use my lavender oil for bath time for baby and me. I also make my own essential oil deodorant, combining this lavender, rose oil, ginger oil, peppermint oil and roman chamomile.
customer_reviews.author: CNN

customer_reviews.title: Headline: Majestic Pure Lavender Oil
customer_reviews.text: Essential Oil: Majestic Pure Lavender Oil I have purchased several four oz.bottles in mint, lemon, eucalyptus, frankincense and today the lavender arrived. The oil has a chemical smell; thus a two star rating. Returning items is a hassle I have to depend on others to return as well as pay the return postage. In the long run I end up absorbing a loss from a small Seniors S.S. No a happy camper.
customer_reviews.author: BDK

customer_reviews.title: We are not happy with this scent.
customer_reviews.text: We do not smell lavender with this oil. I am not sure what the scent is but we do not smell lavender and wish we had not purchased it. We had purchased peppermint oil scent from this seller at least two times and were very satisied with the product. Not so with the lavender oil. YUK
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Pat

customer_reviews.title: Good item.
customer_reviews.text: Came as expected, nice large bottle of oil. Strong so, I'll be using small amounts to achieve the nice pleasant smells I am looking for so it should last a while. I liked how they packaged it for shipping so it all came in good order.
customer_reviews.author: K. McDowell

customer_reviews.title: Great scent
customer_reviews.text: I received my product so quickly. The oil comes in a large 4 oz bottle with a nice glass dropper. The scent is that real spicy lavender that you would expect from a high-quality distillation. I am using it for a variety of things from diffusing, to dropping it on my dryer balls, to making soap. Excellent product and an excellent price point.
customer_reviews.author: Farmer chick

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as previous order
customer_reviews.text: Bought this several months ago. Tried another brand last week, and it was awful, so I went to my order history and re-ordered. This new bottle is not nearly as fragrant and pleasant smelling as the original Original bottle says distilled from Bulgarian Lavender, product of Bulgaria. The write up of this latest order says it's a blend of Bulgarian and French Lavender
customer_reviews.author: Steve Sz

customer_reviews.title: Smells so good. I add it to lotions
customer_reviews.text: I don't know much about oils but I got this a while ago and use it all the time! Smells so good. I add it to lotions, diffusers and just about anything I can.
customer_reviews.author: Josh & Nat

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful essential oil
customer_reviews.text: Not real lavender oil. Definitely smells so artificial. Either that, or shelf life is very short and I got a bad batch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: UPDATED REVIEW-WILL NOT PURCHASE AGAIN!!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE!! 12/8/2015 Now that I've had this oil longer than a day, I will definitely not order it again. It seems diluted, not full 100% essential oil, it's almost as if it's already mixed with water. I'm very disappointed in this product. Original review...... I'm not thrilled with this oil. The scent is just not what I was looking for. Bummer. I was going for the price.
customer_reviews.author: H.D.H.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!!
customer_reviews.text: perfect product! We love the scent of lavender and I have been looking for a good lavender oil for a while. This is just what we wanted. So far we've used it for bug bites, chap lips, sore muscles and just there general " making the room smell awesome" purpose. Believe it or not this essential oil isn't too " oily"a few drops does the trick without leaving any heavy residue A few days after we receive this, I received an email from the seller with a PDF attachment of additional benefits and tricks for lavender will use... Quite a nice touch. I would definitely buy this product again from the seller
customer_reviews.author: LML

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. Works beautifully in diffusers
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Works beautifully in diffusers. Droplet is nice accessory--I wish all essential oils came with one.
customer_reviews.author: G. Pillow

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality oil and very easy to use! Comes with a regular cap as well as a dropper cap so that you can use the proper amount each time as opposed to the standard Euro caps that either don't let you get any drops out of the bottle or dispense too much. This smells great! I use it in my cool mist humidifier for relaxation. I will definitely continue to purchase this brand in the future! The bottle is a great size for the price as well!
customer_reviews.author: SuzeTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Very strong "chemical" smell
customer_reviews.text: I'm a prime member so I received my shipment within 2 days. Packaging was above par. Product was sub par. I am used to YL EO quality and thought I could save some $ by diffusing cheaper brands, BUT this EO does not smell like 100% pure lavender essential oil. There seems to be a very strong "chemical" undertone. It kinda reminds me of lavender scented cleaning agent or laundry detergent. It is too much of a hassle to return it however, so I will be using this for my laundry or adding it to my cleaning agents. I have used doterra, young living, now and aura cacia EOs and so far they have smelled the most pure.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Defuse scent and humidity
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to defuse the scent. It works great! I put it in my candle warmed as I’ve heard the wax may not be that good for you but I want a great smelling home. I put water and lavender in my warmer, then I get humidity and smell. I’m happy with it. Pain???
customer_reviews.author: Keg

customer_reviews.title: The scent is great, but kinda disappears quite fast from the essential ...
customer_reviews.text: The scent is great, but kinda disappears quite fast from the essential oil diffuser I am using it with...although, one drop of it on my t-shirt lasts all day....I think I'll keep it and use on toilet paper rolls and other cheaper applications. Won't buy it again to use with with my diffuser....
customer_reviews.author: Trust me when I tell you....

customer_reviews.title: Majestic Lavender Essential Oil... nice product
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice brand for this product... the scent isn't the best - but ok ... however it works great... The price is an extra plus. If you have animals... you can put into spray bottle with water and spray around on carpets/furniture and the fleas flee. Don't know where they go,,, but I really don't care. My dogs do not itch either. Occasionally I fine mist the back half of their bodies and whatever itch was there is gone as well. Can't believe how well it works. There are brands that smell more floral, but this works just as well for my purpose.
customer_reviews.author: L. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Does not smell like lavender
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write negative reviews but feel like I had to with this product. I make handcrafted body care products that I plan to sell so it is important for me to find a high quality scent. I am very disappointed by the smell of this product. It does not at all smell like lavender but has more of a petroleum odor to it. I purchased it because it seemed inexpensive for the amount of product you are getting. I will now look for another higher priced product with a real lavender smell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it smells so bad. It stinks in the glass container
customer_reviews.text: This stinks! I mean literally, it smells so bad. It stinks in the glass container, it stinks in the diffuser. This is what I get for buying cheap. You get what you pay for. Will not buy again
customer_reviews.author: DKJones

customer_reviews.title: So wonderful smelling and it comes WITH a dropper
customer_reviews.text: So wonderful smelling and it comes WITH a dropper! You don't realize how awesome that is until you order one that doesn't include a dropper and you either have to put it in a different bottle or use a dropper from a different bottle every time. For this and the wonderful quality I will be buying as many of my oils from this company as possible!
customer_reviews.author: MommaCX3 ☀️❤️

customer_reviews.title: Love Lavender
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful for the price. It's lasted me a long time and I love to use it in my homemade conditioners and at bathtime. It fills the house with such a lovely aroma.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle

customer_reviews.title: There are drastically (50% ) cheaper alternatives - and 3x as much oil for same $
customer_reviews.text: I in the end - returned this product. Here, it seems like a great deal - 38.00 for two bottles until you realize they are just 4 oz a piece - whereas I just spent the same amount of money and got TWO 16 oz bottles. Identical in every way except the price.
customer_reviews.author: Midgetguru

customer_reviews.title: Buy now and you will see the change!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought lavender and rosemary essential oils from Majestic Pure and they were exactly what I had expected them to be. I am big on home remedies, so I used these two essential oils for homemade scrubs and soaps. And also to keep my home smelling heavenly. Definitely worth adding to your beauty regimen as they both have some great effects on skin. Amazon offered me a coupon which was cherry on top for the price and the quality they already are.
customer_reviews.author: RD Kaur

customer_reviews.title: Great for Stressed Out People
customer_reviews.text: I love lavender-- it is always so calming. Now with the homeschooling nightmare, the stress around here is growing. Having the lavender scent in the house is really helping keeping my special needs son calmer. This product has a really nice blend and scent-- highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: heathermcc

customer_reviews.title: Sooths sore muscles and relaxes me.
customer_reviews.text: I apply this lavender to the back of my neck before retiring to bed each night. It puts me out like a light! I also use it to relieve my sore muscles. If you are looking for a grade-A lavender oil, than don't hesitate to purchase this particular brand. I really enjoy the health benefits of offers me!
customer_reviews.author: Frado

customer_reviews.title: ONE PRODUCT- MANY USES!
customer_reviews.text: I use this mixed with water in my diffuser. I use it on cotton balls as sachets in my drawers. I use it in lotions, salves, ointments, etc. Wonderful, versatile product!
customer_reviews.author: Edwina Lee Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: It's lavender.
customer_reviews.text: Well it is lavender essential oil, so A plus there. Not sure why amazon is asking how many stars I'd give it for pain relief...it is a flower oil. I got it to chillax my high strung husband and because my baby's butt likes having it for diaper rash.
customer_reviews.author: Chanjin

product_meta.title: Majestic Pure Lavender Oil, Natural, Therapeutic Grade, Premium Quality Blend of Lavender Essential Oil, 4 fl. Oz
feature_bullets: Majestic Pure Lavender Oil; blend of two (2) pure lavender oil; Lavandula angustifolia from Bulgaria and Lavandula hybrida from France; steam distilled; Therapeutic grade; Packaged in USA

AROMA: Best sampled on a test strip or tissue to allow the aroma to breathe, evolve and open up; top note with a strong aroma, it has a rich floral scent that is somewhat fruitier, mellower and less camphoraceous; Lavender oil is known to be helpful in soothing the mind and body when used in aromatherapy

SAFETY WARNING: For external use only. Other than aromatherapy, dilute with a carrier oil. For topical use, rub a very small amount on the inside of your elbow area to test for any allergic reaction before use, discontinue if irritation occurs; Avoid contact with eyes, keep out of the reach of children. If pregnant, consult with your health care provider before use
Majestic Pure lavender essential oil offers fresh fragrance that blends well with almost any other essence; the aroma becomes more flowery when it evolves
Delivered with a premium quality glass dropper for ease-of-use
